trans-unit.resname: PFUT·87★ | Korlash, Heir to Blackblade | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Korlash, Heir to Blackblade's power and toughness are each equal to the number of Swamps you control. {1}{B}: Regenerate Korlash. Grandeur — Discard another card named Korlash, Heir to Blackblade: Search your library for up to two Swamp cards, put them onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.
Haste Storm Entity enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it for each other spell cast this turn.
Dweldian magi don't enter the Realm of Thrones when they die. Instead their souls are drawn to great works of magic.
